T02D3208:213b-1: t'a rodbha wa ku ru kull'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3208:213b-3: sgrol ma las 'byung ba'i ku ru kull'a'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3208:213b-4: sgrol ma las 'byung ba'i ku ru ku lle la phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02D3208:213b-5: / re zhig thog mar sngags pas yid du 'ong
T02D3208:213b-6: bar 'gyur ba'i gnas 'ga' zhig tu 'jam pa'i stan
T02D3208:213b-7: nang tshangs can la sogs pa la nye bar gnas
T02D3208:213b-8: te / thang ka la sogs pa la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma bkram la /
T02D3208:213b-9: phyi rol gyi mchod pa byas nas rang gi snying gar ;
T02D3208:213b-10: dri med zla ba nya ba'i mdog / dbyangs yig dang po legs las 'byung //
T02D3208:213b-11: sems kyi zla ba legs bsgoms la //
T02D3208:213b-12: sa bon de steng dgod par bya //
T02D3208:213b-13: dro ba rnams kyi bzhi pa ni //
T02D3208:213b-14: me yi ge steng na gnas //
T02D3208:213b-15: yi ge ai dang yang dag ldan //
T02D3208:213b-16: nam mkha' gnyis kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D3208:213b-17: de yi 'od zer sna tshogs kyis //
T02D3208:213b-18: 'jig rten dri ma med byas shing //
T02D3208:213b-19: mi mdzad khams sogs sbyangs byas nas //
T02D3208:213b-20: ku ru ku lle'i rir song ste //
T02D3208:213b-21: de ni legs par bskul nas kyang //
T02D3208:213b-22: spyan drangs nas ni mdun du bzhugs //
T02D3208:214a-0: sa bon de las mkhas pa @214a * //
T02D3208:214a-2: / mchod pa'i sprin tshogs chen po spro //
T02D3208:214a-3: me tog bdug pa de bzhin sgron //
T02D3208:214a-4: dri dang lha bshos tshogs rnams dang //
T02D3208:214a-5: 'gying bag phreng ba gar dang glu //
T02D3208:214a-6: rol mo'i mchod sogs de bzhin du //
T02D3208:214a-7: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D3208:214a-8: bdag gis sdig kun so sor bshags //
T02D3208:214a-9: 'gro ba'i dge la rje yi rang //
T02D3208:214a-10: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D3208:214a-11: sngags 'di lan gsum brjod byas la //
T02D3208:214a-12: de nas bzod pa mdzod ces kyang //
T02D3208:214a-13: de yi tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs ni 'di yin te /
T02D3208:214a-14: bdag ni rmongs pa'i yid kyis kyang ;
T02D3208:214a-15: / sdig pa cung zad gang bgyis pa //
T02D3208:214a-16: lus can gang yin skyob mdzad pa'i //
T02D3208:214a-17: lha mo khyod kyis de bzod mdzod //
T02D3208:214a-18: sems ni byams la gnas par bya //
T02D3208:214a-19: zhing de nas ni yang sems snying rje la nges
T02D3208:214a-20: par bzhag par byas la rab tu dga' ba'i sems
T02D3208:214a-21: kyang legs par bskyed pas gnas par bya ste //
T02D3208:214a-22: phyi nas ni btang snyoms su byas pas /
T02D3208:214a-23: thams cad kyang sems tsam du rnam par gzhag par bya ba'o //
T02D3208:214a-24: rang bzhin nga rgyal gzhom don du //
T02D3208:214a-25: de nas sems kyang stong par bya //
T02D3208:214a-26: stong nyid me yis bsregs pas ni //
T02D3208:214a-27: yang srid phung po lnga mi 'byung //
T02D3208:214a-28: aom stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ni nga yin no //
T02D3208:214a-29: yud tsam stong nyid rnal 'byor bya //
T02D3208:214a-30: sems ngal gso bar bya ba dang //
T02D3208:214a-31: dang po'i smon lam dran byas la //
T02D3208:214a-32: yang ni sa bon tsam dran bya //
T02D3208:214a-33: gcig tu yongs su mya ngan 'das las //
T02D3208:214a-34: bdag gis sems can rab tu bsgral //
T02D3208:214a-35: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho brgal dka' las //
T02D3208:214a-36: ji ltar de dag bdag gis bsgral //
T02D3208:214a-37: snying rjes zin pas 'di rtogs nas //
T02D3208:214a-38: spyod med stong pa nyid btang ste //
T02D3208:214a-39: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis //
T02D3208:214a-40: sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa la //
T02D3208:214a-41: sa bon sangs rgyas byin brlabs kyis //
T02D3208:214a-44: dbyangs yig aa las legs 'byung ngo //
T02D3208:214a-45: zla ba der yang 'od zer sbyor ba yis //
T02D3208:214a-46: 'jig rten khams rnams ma lus pa //
T02D3208:214a-47: de yi rnam sbyang bsgom par bya //
T02D3208:214b-0: sbyangs @214b nas mkhyen bya 'od zer gyis //
T02D3208:214b-1: sangs rgyas bye ba thams cad ni //
T02D3208:214b-2: autpala de la zhugs par bsgom //
T02D3208:214b-3: de las sgrol ma 'byung ba yin //
T02D3208:214b-4: sku mdog dmar po phyag bzhi ma //
T02D3208:214b-5: padma dmar po'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D3208:214b-6: gos dmar zung bsnams skal ldan ma //
T02D3208:214b-7: rna gdub dbu rgyan dmar po can //
T02D3208:214b-8: g-yas kyi phyag gnyis mi 'jigs dang //
T02D3208:214b-9: mnga' bsnams pa dang gzhan ma yi //
T02D3208:214b-10: g-yon pa'i phyag ni gnyis kyis kyang //
T02D3208:214b-11: gzhu dang mchog dmar autpala bsnams /
T02D3208:214b-12: ku ru kull'a'i ri phug gi / nang bzhugs snang mtha'i cod pan gnas //
T02D3208:214b-14: sgra can de steng yongs gnas pa //
T02D3208:214b-15: 'dod pa'i lha ni khyo shug gnyis //
T02D3208:214b-16: shin tu rgyal ba bsgom bya ste //
T02D3208:214b-17: de la rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs //
T02D3208:214b-18: rig pa kun la rnam sbyangs ma //
T02D3208:214b-19: rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i //
T02D3208:214b-20: bcom ldan 'das ma yang dag bsgom //
T02D3208:214b-21: dam tshig sku ni legs ldan pas //
T02D3208:214b-22: ye shes 'khor lo legs par dgug / skad cig snang ba yongs rdzogs pas //
T02D3208:214b-23: ye shes 'khor lo mdun du bzhugs //
T02D3208:214b-26: spyan drangs dgug gzhug brtan par bya /
T02D3208:214b-28: dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i sbyor bas kha'i lam nas gzhug par bya ste /
T02D3208:214b-29: lag pa gnyis snyim par byas la gung mo gnyis ka yang rtse sprang cing /
T02D3208:214b-30: rtse 'og mthil du srin lag gnyis dgug pa mtheb
T02D3208:214b-31: mo gnyis khong du btang ba'i 'og tu mnan la
T02D3208:214b-32: / mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi glor sbyar
T02D3208:214b-33: zhing gang gi tshe mthe'u chung gnyis kyang cung zad
T02D3208:214b-34: / rtse dgug pa'o // 'dis ni dam tshig bcing bar bya ba dang /
T02D3208:214b-35: 'dis 'khor lo gzhug par bya ba yang yin no //
T02D3208:214b-36: de nas ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhes bya ba'i
T02D3208:214b-37: tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs brjod pas dbang bskur ba
T02D3208:214b-38: don du gnyer bar bya ste /
T02D3208:214b-39: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D3208:214b-40: ji ltar byin pa chen po'i che //
T02D3208:214b-41: bdag kyang bskyab par bgyid don du //
T02D3208:214b-42: mkha' rdor la sogs bdag la stsol //
T02D3208:214b-43: de dag cher gyur sbyin mdzad de//
T02D3208:215a-0: @215a * // dbang bskur rgyal po zhes bya ba'o //
T02D3208:215a-1: me tog dbang bzhin rgyal po yang //
T02D3208:215a-2: spyan ma la sogs lnga bdag gis //
T02D3208:215a-3: khams gsum pa yi phyag byas pa'i //
T02D3208:215a-4: dbang bskur rdo rje chen po pa //
T02D3208:215a-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi //
T02D3208:215a-6: gnas las legs byung bdag gis sbyin //
T02D3208:215a-7: sangs rgyas dbang bskur ba yi sgrol //
T02D3208:215a-8: chos ni gtsug gi nor bu bzhugs //
T02D3208:215a-10: 'jig rten gsum po gsal bar mdzad //
T02D3208:215a-11: dbang bskur rin chen thob pas ni //
T02D3208:215a-12: dngos grub thams cad rab grub byed //
T02D3208:215a-13: lo phyed brtan pas legs gnas dang //
T02D3208:215a-14: ji skad bshad mchog sngon du btang //
T02D3208:215a-15: thun gsum la ni gtor ma btang //
T02D3208:215a-16: sgom pa'i rim pa sngon 'gro bas //
T02D3208:215a-17: sgrol ma'i snying po yis ni 'dir //
T02D3208:215a-18: sngags ni mnyam par bzhag pas bzlas //
T02D3208:215a-19: aom ku ru kulle hr'i:sv'a h'a /
T02D3208:215a-20: de dag gi sngon du 'gro ba yi ge 'bum
T02D3208:215a-21: bzlas pa las yang dag par brtsam par bya ba'o
T02D3208:215a-22: // cha shas kyis ni shes rab 'phel //
T02D3208:215a-23: cha gzhan gyis ni dbang du byed //
T02D3208:215a-24: cha ni gsum pa nyid kyis kyang //
T02D3208:215a-25: mi yi dug ni 'byin par byed //
T02D3208:215a-26: de ni 'jig rten kun gyi mchod par byed 'gyur zhing //
T02D3208:215a-27: bud med rgyags pa dag gis dregs ldan rnams kyang ste //
T02D3208:215a-28: ji ltar 'dod bzhin sngags 'dzin byed pa'i rje bo yis //
T02D3208:215a-29: bshad la goms pa'i sbyor bas lha mi mdzes rnams kyang //
T02D3208:215a-30: sgrin pos rim gyis goms byas te //
T02D3208:215a-31: dngos grub phran tshegs bsgrub byas la //
T02D3208:215a-32: dngos grub chen po bsgrub par bya //
T02D3208:215a-33: thams cad du 'dir the tshom spung //
T02D3208:215a-34: sgrol ma las byung ba'i ku ru ku lle'i sgrub thabs rtog pa las gsungs pa rdzogs so /
